Html:
I was working on a project that made use of GMap.NET but needed to support MBTiles databases. I created a provider that is available here: https://github.com/geobabbler/MBTilesMapProvider

This post is mainly as an FYI in case someone needs something similar.

thanks!

p.s. it's more of a cache provider than 'map'
Yeah, I was a little unsure which direction to go. All of the map providers seemed to be pulling from some sort of tiles source so I stuck with that.
